currentSprint.name: Sprint 1: Become the Signal
currentSprint.vision: Establish public voice, build audience, find what resonates. Do NOT build paid product yet.

weeks.theme: Launch: The 'What Do You Do?' Signal

objectives.text: Update all social media profiles (LinkedIn, YouTube, X, Instagram)
Finalize and post LinkedIn article - 'What do you do?' angle
Record and publish YouTube video - 'What do you do?' angle
Reactivate email list with comeback email
Share first content piece in WhatsApp community
Write and publish LinkedIn post - expertise devaluation angle
Record and publish YouTube video - expertise devaluation angle
Send email to list with week's content
Engage with all comments and responses from week 1
Write and publish LinkedIn post - identity scaffolding angle
Record and publish YouTube video - identity scaffolding angle
Begin building Recalibration Assessment (design + question framework)
Review first 2 weeks of engagement data - what resonated?
Write and publish LinkedIn post - body as strategic asset angle
Record and publish YouTube video - body as strategic asset angle
Complete and launch Recalibration Assessment MVP
Update all content CTAs to point to assessment
Write and publish LinkedIn post - loneliness/depth angle
Record and publish YouTube video - loneliness/depth angle
Analyze Recalibration Assessment initial data
Write and publish LinkedIn post - preparing for wrong future angle
Record and publish YouTube video - preparing for wrong future angle
Mid-sprint review: what's working, what's not, what to adjust
Write and publish LinkedIn post - AI as mirror angle
Record and publish YouTube video - AI as mirror angle
Review all content performance data so far
Create content based on strongest performing angle from weeks 1-7
Decide: double down on top 2-3 angles
Full sprint retrospective: what worked, what didn't
Audience analysis: who showed up, what do they care about
Revenue readiness assessment: is paid community viable?
Design Sprint 2 based on all learnings
